show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content: My guest is Cheryl van Daalen-Smith, PhD, a feminist nurse from Toronto with a profound conscience who specializes in… understanding and advocating for girls and for all children.  She’s a rare academic whose intellectual work is firmly planted in the ethic and expression of caring.   You will benefit from knowing Dr van Daalen-Smith and her work.
